title: Evaluación: Completa los espacios
instructions: Lee cada frase y completa el espacio con la palabra correcta. Presta atención a la gramática y al contexto.

exercises.text: Yesterday, I went to the park and saw a beautiful ____ flying in the sky.
exercises.hint: Es un objeto que puede volar.

exercises.text: My brother is very tall, but I am much ____ than him.
Please remember to bring your umbrella. It looks like it’s going to ____.
I usually have cereal and milk for ____, but today I had pancakes.
When the teacher entered the classroom, everyone became very ____.
To get to the museum, walk two blocks straight and then turn ____.
My favorite subject in school is ____, because I enjoy learning about numbers.
After dinner, we washed the dishes and cleaned the entire ____.
I lost my keys yesterday, but luckily someone ____ them and gave them back.
At the zoo, we saw lions, elephants, and even a baby ____, which was very cute.
